Values of tests for different parameters of training and evaluating the 3x3-> 1x1 model.

100, 500: 0.30233538150787354
10, 10: 0.4226294159889221 
100, 10: 0.3861066997051239
100, 1000: 0.3020850121974945 <----


Research showed that Crossentropy loss function combined with SGD optimizer gives the best results.
